DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long-term safety and efficacy of pregabalin in patients with postherpetic neuralgia.
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Pregabalin in Patients With Postherpetic Neuralgia.
DOC.criteria: Must have met the inclusion criteria for preceding doubleblind BID study in postherpetic neuralgia Must have received pregabalin/placebo under doubleblind conditions for a minimum of 3 weeks. Patients cannot participate if they experienced a serious adverse event during preceding doubleblind BID study which was determined to be related to the study medication.
